config.defaultFormat: Default document format for preview and export
config.defaultPaperSize: Default paper size for PDF export
config.previewUpdateDelay: Delay in milliseconds before updating preview after editing
config.enableSyncScroll: Enable synchronized scrolling between editor and preview
config.includeTemplateComments: Include explanatory comments in generated templates
config.photoPath: Path to photo image for Japanese rirekisho format
config.defaultLanguage: Default CV language (auto-detect, English, or Japanese)
